trans-unit.target: Orders squadron to engage the enemy. Can only be executed while on a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>command mission<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
Orders squadron to disengage the enemy and fall back. Can only be executed while on a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>command mission<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
Orders squadron to re-engage the enemy. Can only be executed while on a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>command mission<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

Orders squadron to execute a limit break on a single target. Also increases damage dealt by party members within a 20-yalm range. Can only be executed while on a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>command mission<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, limit gauge is at level 1, and all three squadron members are conscious.
Displays Order Hotbar. Can only be executed while on a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>command mission<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
